Trigger The Melfesh Monster dies

Effect The Melfesh Monster explodes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30]. Creatures in the area take @Damage[3d8[fire],3d8[poison]]{3d8 fire and 3d8 poison damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true|name:Death Throes] save). This ability replaces Reactive Growth.
